#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 8388608
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll test, rec1[24], rec2[24], i, n;
    rec1[0]=0;
    rec1[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=23;i++)
    {
        rec1[i]=2*rec1[i-1]+(1<<i-1)*(i);
        rec1[i]=rec1[i]%mod;
    }
    rec2[0]=0;
    rec2[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=23;i++)
    {
        rec2[i]=rec2[i-1]+rec1[i];
        rec2[i]=rec2[i]%mod;
    }
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        if(n<=22)
            cout<<rec2[n]<<endl;
        else
            cout<<rec2[23]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
